scripts.-v,--verbose: Prefix each output line with the name of the originating workspace
scripts.-i,--interlaced: Print the output of commands in real-time instead of buffering it
scripts.-j,--jobs: The maximum number of parallel tasks that the execution will be limited to
scripts.-t,--topological: Run the command after all workspaces it depends on (regular) have finished
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -pvit -j unlimited run build
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach -piv -j unlimited run watch
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -piv -j unlimited run test
